description:
Sends a message to the specified channel. 
If no channel is given, then the message will be sent to the current channel.

errors.invalidChannel: Please provide a valid channel ID or mention.
errors.guildOnly: You can only use this command in a server.
errors.modChannel: Provided channel is moderator only, please mention an accessible text channel or provide a valid text channel ID.
errors.noText: Please provide a message to send.
errors.unknownError: This error should never happen, please report this to the developers.
errors.noPerms: I do not have permission to send messages in that channel.
errors.userNoPerms: You do not have permission to send messages in the provided channel.
